channel.title: Raven Laine on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Raven Laine on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Humans of Scotland
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan AM - Angela Miller RL - Raven Laine MB - Michael Byrne MM On this episode on Iriss.fm I went along to The Alliance Scotland, where The Alliance run a project called the ‘Humans of Scotland’, and we’re going to be hearing from a couple of people that participated in the ‘Humans of Scotland’. Raven Laine, Michael Byrne, and also first off we hear from project manager, Angela Miller.
